title: The Purple adventures of Lady Elaine Fairchilde
brief_description: Children’s program that uses a combination of performing puppets and musical numbers to describe the purple adventures of Lady Fairchilde and her make believe trip to Jupiter. The colour purple signifies an imaginary place far away and only make believe can send your there - a place called planet purple.
